title_modsupdater_title: ModsUpdater for Vintage Story v{mu_ver} (by Laerinok)
first_launch_mods_location_ask: Enter the path to the mods folder. (Leave blank to use the default path):
first_launch_confirms_update_info: You can proceed with the update, or quit to modify the config.ini file (for example, to exclude mods from the update).
